reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: The hotel was very new and clean. The rooms were fully equipped. hot water shower, TV, air con, towels, toiletries, etc. The beds were very comfortable and there was a nice little balcony. The restaurant served good food.

reviews.title: Nice and warm hotel but pretty small bed
reviews.text: We were just passing through the town, but if we go there again we'll stay there. At the time we went (before 2009 - but drop down menu won't go any further than 2009) the price was on special offer, 700 baht instead of 1200 baht.

reviews.title: CLEAN,FUNCTIONAL AND COMFORTABLE!
reviews.text: My husband and i have stayed in this hotel last Dec 2009. The hotel reception was nice and comfy. All staffs were friendly and helpful. They were always there to accommodate whatever we need. The location was excellent, in the heart of town and everything. I can just walk to the night market for foods. So.. so.. convenience.
